about_the_game:
Our new DJ Table Visualizer features a 3D turn table complete with vibrant background graphics that change each time you play!

Once downloaded, the DJ Table Visualizer will automatically add itself to your Visualizer rotation.

Key features:

  • Brand new Visualzer featuring a 3D turn table and vibrant background graphics!
  • Our DJ Table Visualizer will automatically integrate into your songs in Rhythm Zone after downloading!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP 32 Bit
  • Processor: Pentium IV / Athlon XP 2.0ghz or higher
  • Memory: 1GB system ram
  • Graphics: Geforce 5 / ATI Radeon X100 / Intel 965 onboard graphics or higher
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0 or later
  • Hard Drive: 550MB space free
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4ghz processor or higher
  • Memory: 2GB system ram
  • Graphics: Nvidia 7600/ATI x1600 or better
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or later
  • Hard Drive: 550MB space free
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
